question: 約束する
userAnswer: to-promise | I-promise <tag>(dictionary form as a complete sentence)</tag>
activeAnswer: to-promise | I-promise <tag>(dictionary form as a complete sentence)</tag>
sourceMnemonic: <ja>約束</ja> is a “promise.” So when you add <ja>する</ja> to it you’re making it a verb, meaning <vocabulary>to promise</vocabulary>. Now promise you’ll remember!
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the same as <ja>約束</ja> with <ja>する</ja> added. Make sure you know <ja>約束</ja> and you'll know this word as well.
